name: Don't Get The Job
description:
Oh no!

Your recruiter has accidentally set up an interview with some crazy people at a company called The Forum! 

Your task is simple, just go through the motions and whatever you do, DON'T get the job. But as it turns out, that's a bit harder than you might've originally thought.

This game was made in 3 days for the Wowie 3.0 game jam, we hope you enjoy it! And if you wanna know more about The Forum, check out another game we're working on; Glitcheon!

Soundtrack: Credits: 

River Forge games: Coding and writing

Yän: 2D assets and audio

Bonicle: 3D models and animations

Special thanks to Moumekie for helping solve some problems with the interviewer model!
